definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: These readings are obtained from a Japanese magnetosphere simulator.
sentences.chinese: 这些读数来源于“日本磁气圈模拟器”。

sentences.english: I recorded the measurement and then moved up the branch step-by-step.
sentences.chinese: 我记录下读数再一步一步地向上移动树枝。

sentences.english: Note that the current must flow through the ammeter in order to reach the circuit.
sentences.chinese: 注意，电路中的电流必须通过电流表以测量到读数。

sentences.english: When resistance in the circuit exceeds 140 ohms , the reading is not completely dependable.
sentences.chinese: 网路电阻超过140欧姆时，读数就完全不准了。
该色度计的其中一项读数是绿色。

sentences.english: The vertical angle refers to the difference between the vertical readings.
sentences.chinese: 竖直角则是两个方向的竖盘读数之差。

sentences.english: Attach test leads to pins 1 and 2 and note ohmmeter reading.
sentences.chinese: 把测试探针连接到插头1和2，并记下欧姆表读数。

sentences.english: Generally, an uncured specimen has a hardness reading below normal.
sentences.chinese: 通常，未处理的样品的硬度读数会低于正常值。

sentences.english: No difference recognized between the engine MAP reading and the barometric (atmospheric) pressure reading at start-up.
sentences.chinese: 启动时发动机MAP读数与大气压读数无差异。

sentences.english: No difference recognized between the engine MAP reading and the barometric (atmospheric) pressure reading at start-up.
sentences.chinese: 启动时发动机MAP读数与大气压读数无差异。

sentences.english: The meter reading will be the algebraic sum of all these sources.
sentences.chinese: 而电压表的读数则是所有这些源的代数和。

sentences.english: The ideal ammeter should read zero when its input terminals are left open.
sentences.chinese: 当输入端开路时，理想安培计的读数应当为零。

sentences.english: A new intelligent reading system for analog indicating meter was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新的模拟式指示表智能读数系统。

sentences.english: My little son can number to 100.
sentences.chinese: 我的小儿子读数能读到100了。

sentences.english: Dosimeter absorbances should be read within a short period after exposure to radiation.
sentences.chinese: 辐射灭菌，应尽快剂指剂读数据。

definition: to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
